short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A lightweight vertical tab manager for Chrome.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🚀 Boost Your Browsing Experience with the Vertical Tab Manager! 🚀

Just 📌 it to your navbar and click the icon to get going, you can move the side panel from your Chrome settings if you'd like it elsewhere!

Struggling with tab overload? Transform your Chrome browsing experience with the ultimate light-weight vertical tab manager that's as lightweight as it is powerful. Say goodbye to clutter and hello to a streamlined, efficient way to manage your tabs.

✨ Vertical Tab Management: Experience a cleaner, vertical display of your tabs that makes navigation and organization effortless. Perfect for multitasking professionals and casual users alike.

🔍 Easy Search and Navigate: Quickly find the tabs you need with our intuitive search function. Jump between tabs with ease and never lose track of your web pages again.

🚀 Lightning Fast: It's designed to be ultra-lightweight, ensuring it doesn't slow down your browser. Enjoy faster browsing with no lag.

🛡️ Privacy Focused: Your privacy is paramount. It operates locally on your device, ensuring that your browsing data stays yours and yours alone.

🎨 Customizable Interface: Allows you to organize the priority order of your tabs for your convenience!

👍User-Friendly: It's simple and easy to use right out of the box, just click the icon and get going!

🌟 Free to Use: Get all these fantastic features at no cost. Enhance your browsing for free with SleekTabs!

🔗 Stay Organized, Stay Productive: Navigating multiple tabs is no longer a hassle. Keep your browser tidy and your mind clear!
